amendment.description: To provide additional funds for certain water and related resources.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1666 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1666 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S11531; text: CR S11531) To provide additional funds for certain water and related resources.
